item.title: üìÖOpen-Source Google Calendar Assistant Managing one's calendar can be a repetitive task - perfect for automation with an AI agent @jackgordley's re...
item.description:
üìÖOpen-Source Google Calendar Assistant

Managing one's calendar can be a repetitive task - perfect for automation with an AI agent

@jackgordley's recent open source project tackles exactly that!

Blog: https://gordles.io/posts/calvin
Code: https://github.com/jgordley/GoogleCalendarAssistant

item.title: ü¶úLangChain x Google The official Google `generative-ai` repo has a ton of resources for getting started with Gemini This includes SEVEN different n...
item.description:
ü¶úLangChain x Google

The official Google `generative-ai` repo has a ton of resources for getting started with Gemini

This includes SEVEN different notebooks for using LangChain to orchestrate a Gemini-powered LLM app

Dive into all the goodness: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/generative-ai/tree/main/language/orchestration/langchain

item.title: RT DataStax: Learn how to build GenAI chat! üíªüí¨ Join us on Dec 20. We'll dive deep with @GoogleCloud's Yemi Falokun & @LangChainAI's @RLanceMarti...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇDataStax
Learn how to build GenAI chat! üíªüí¨ Join us on Dec 20.

We'll dive deep with @GoogleCloud's Yemi Falokun & @LangChainAI's @RLanceMartin to build a customer service chatbot with Vertex AI embeddings and RAG with LangChain + Astra DB vector search.

https://dtsx.io/3GLaMoP
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Nazeem: Introducing Vexa Search - Get information from a given image (like Google Images). It uses the Gemini Vision model and Llava model as fallb...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇNazeem
Introducing Vexa Search - Get information from a given image (like Google Images). It uses the Gemini Vision model and Llava model as fallback. Just a fun weekend project, check it out! :)

Powered by @LangChainAI

Demo: https://vexasearch.com/

Repo: https://github.com/n4ze3m/vexasearch

item.title: ü¶úüëøChaos Engineering The behavior of LLMs can be unpredictable and chaotic ChatChaos is a fake LLM by @andrewnguonly specifically designed to ret...
item.description:
ü¶úüëøChaos Engineering

The behavior of LLMs can be unpredictable and chaotic

ChatChaos is a fake LLM by @andrewnguonly specifically designed to return invalid JSON, hallucinate, and have long response times

Can be used to stress test your system!

Blog: https://medium.com/@andrewnguonly/chatchaos-the-good-the-bad-and-the-ugly-81f9612d7b00
item.author: LangChain

item.title: ü¶úüí¨FastUI-Chat Want to get an easy frontend for your LangChain app? All written in Python? @Shroominic made an awesome example hooking up LangCha...
item.description:
ü¶úüí¨FastUI-Chat

Want to get an easy frontend for your LangChain app? All written in Python?

@Shroominic made an awesome example hooking up LangChain to FastUI (a new framework from the @pydantic team)

Check it out here: https://github.com/shroominic/fastui-chat/tree/main

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
ü¶ôüåã Ollama local multimodal models üåãü¶ô

You can now add local image reasoning abilities to your @LangChainAI ü¶úüîó Python and JS projects via LLaVA and @OLLAMA!

Upgrading will also use their chat interface if available.

item.title: RT Jack Gordley: Introducing ADB Chat, an LLM chatbot built with @LangchainAI, @streamlit, and the @Android Debug Bridge to aid in Android Forensics i...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJack Gordley
Introducing ADB Chat, an LLM chatbot built with @LangchainAI, @streamlit, and the @Android Debug Bridge to aid in Android Forensics investigations. Simply plug in your Android Device and chat with files, processes, and other system info https://github.com/jgordley/chat-adb
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jack Gordley: Excited to share my new Google Calendar assistant built with @nextjs, @FastAPI, and @MongoDB. Core logic built using @LangChainAI and...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJack Gordley
Excited to share my new Google Calendar assistant built with @nextjs, @FastAPI, and @MongoDB. Core logic built using @LangChainAI and the @OpenAI API. A lot is possible right now using LLMs and simple tool definitions, such as the GCal API specs: https://gordles.io/posts/calvin

item.title: RT Roger Taylor: How @LangChainAI improved context for lyric continuation from limited seeds:‚ú≥Ô∏èRetrieve most relevant chunks‚ú≥Ô∏èGet full parent docs...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇRoger Taylor
How @LangChainAI improved context for lyric continuation from limited seeds:‚ú≥Ô∏èRetrieve most relevant chunks‚ú≥Ô∏èGet full parent docs for complete style/tone‚ú≥Ô∏èOr, retrieve bigger chunks, more context while fitting LLM limits.
See Mahesh Deshwal walkthru: https://buff.ly/47WN6JU
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Hard Kothari: Another week and some great updates by @LangChainAI The newsletter is out and below is my short üîëtake away: LangChain v0.1 Langcha...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇHard Kothari
Another week and some great updates by @LangChainAI

The newsletter is out and below is my short üîëtake away:

LangChain v0.1
Langchain is splitting its code in
- langchain: Main Congnitive Architecture
- langchain-core: Abstractions and LCEL
- langchain-community: 3rd Party‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1736765123224555687

item.title: RT Sebastian Rojo: Excited to share my latest project for the @Supabase Hackathon! I've developed a unique RAG system that's voice-activated. It's des...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇSebastian Rojo
Excited to share my latest project for the @Supabase Hackathon! I've developed a unique RAG system that's voice-activated. It's designed to discuss the architecture of any application using a mix of @LangChainAI , @supabase , @nextjs, @FastAPI, and @vocodehq. üßµ

item.title: RT Vinit Agrawal: Made a video about using LangChain's (@LangChainAI) Self-Querying Query Constructor and use it in Slack's (@SlackHQ) search API. Sel...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇVinit Agrawal
Made a video about using LangChain's (@LangChainAI) Self-Querying Query Constructor and use it in Slack's (@SlackHQ) search API.

Self-Querying is usually used with vector stores like @weaviate_io, but here I am using it for Slack's search.

Check it out:
https://youtu.be/DTifxo4hhzA?si=knQ87py3QGvMr2ws
item.author: LangChain
